title: Personalized Literacy Support Strategies for Enhancing Online Education Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of social studies concepts at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: Integrated educational environments for students with learning disabilities and varying literacy levels

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts with over 80% precision using visual and auditory aids provided in online lecture materials
Learners can correctly interpret meanings of specialized terminology with over 90% accuracy using customized vocabulary support tools (glossary, image descriptions, etc.)
Learners can logically present practical applications of complex textual information to real-life scenarios through context-based case analysis activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
